spec_data.Name: perl-Test-Pod-Coverage
spec_data.Description:
Test::Pod::Coverage is used to create a test for your distribution, to
ensure that all relevant files in your distribution are appropriately
documented in pod.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:08:14 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Check for pod coverage in your distribution
